channel.title: [PI] Clicking objects while not more than 1 square away
channel.description:
So here is the situation:
Packet error that occurs occasionally, most likely relevant because I tested my client with another source and the clicking works and no packet error.
packet Error? [code] Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 [/code]
Actual Problem:
If I am more than 1 square away and one click a bank booth(Or any object) I will run over to them and the action will occur. However if I am standing right next to them and one click the object the action will not occur.
If I right click the object and choose the second option IE(Quickly Bank) I can be at any distance.
Since my Client works with another source without this error I can safely assume it is something server sided. Been sifting through my object clicking with no luck so far.

item.title: [PI] Clicking objects while not more than 1 square away
item.dc:creator: @50percentelf 50percentelf
item.description:
@50percentelf wrote:

The problem is in not being able to one click any object that results in an action unless I’m more than 1 square away.

Altars, Chests, banks, doors(not opening but attaching say a tele to them).

[edit]-finally fixed it.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Clicking objects while not more than 1 square away

item.title: [PI] Clicking objects while not more than 1 square away
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

I can’t remember where I read this from, but I think it’s something to do with stopping cheat clients doing something. It isn’t anything you should be worried about either way.

Read full topic
